title: Modality
description: VeriSimDB octad modality identifier. Each modality represents a distinct representational dimension of a hexad entity. Together the 8 modalities form the octad -- the fundamental multi-modal unit of VeriSimDB.

x-enum-descriptions.graph: RDF triples and property-graph edges. Captures relationships between entities.
x-enum-descriptions.vector: Dense embedding for similarity search (cosine, dot-product, L2).
x-enum-descriptions.tensor: Multi-dimensional numeric array. Shape + flattened data.
x-enum-descriptions.semantic: Ontological type annotations, properties, and proof blobs.
x-enum-descriptions.provenance: Origin tracking, transformation chain, and actor trail (SHA-256 hash chain).
x-enum-descriptions.spatial: Geospatial coordinates, geometry types, and proximity queries.
